title: Atiny what are some of your predictions for Ateez next comeback? The members have been constantly showing spoilers but I just can't seem to figure it out 😅 - Quora

response.answer_text: Welll prepare for an essay lol if you watched the crescent party or not ,ateez did an online concert which was apparently full of spoilers One of which were numbers and those apparently correspond to these colors which are familiar in some of ateez other content as well     What people are also saying is that those numbers are also coordinates and they show a place like the desert(similar to the setting of pirate king ) which brings me to the next point:  This supports the theory of it being similar to pirate king or treasure :  I would suggest listening to the fan chants of the songs,you’ll hear the adlibs clearly THE RELEASE DATE   the eclipse has gotta have something to do with it so if the teasers or announcement comes on Monday 22 June…I told ya so lol plus  There’s also a theory of a royal concept thing but Um yeah I hoped this helped explain,but if your interested I don’t mind sharing more theories I have ☺️✨ (also credit to all the twt atinys ,y’all smart,I could put an essay together with the research)
